name: Laser Defender (OuterGazer)
description:
For the Galaxy!

Fast paced top-down space shooting little game done as part of a learning course. It features 30 different wave paths, 9 different enemies and weapon types, 3 power-ups and a boss fight.

The game is looped to infinity so play it as long as you like and share your highscore in the comments!

The game runs on a 1080x1920 resolution with vertical 9:16 aspect ratio. Until I rebuild the game to fit a smaller space, I recommend playing it in the following URL: https://sharemygame.com/@OuterGazer/laser-defender

Move the ship with WASD or arrow keys. Shoot with space or left click and pause with 'P'.

Have fun!
